content.question: One reason for Lin’s choice of black granite for the design of the Vietnam Veterans Memorial was to elicit

choices.label: a sense of disorientation created by the memorial’s dark facade
a personal connection because the memorial’s polished surface reflects the viewer
luxury connotations because of the great expense of the granite
historical associations because the material is also used in nearby earlier monuments

content.answer: a personal connection because the memorial’s polished surface reflects the viewer

topic.text: 10.2: Purpose and Audience in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, function, and/or context of a work of art (or group of related works of art) elicit a response or shape its reception.
